examples.hypothesis: esikhuweni akusathokozwa n nabo kherige bathokoze
ugogo wabona umqasa weqela ngendleleni n
abuyele ngenzini la n bekahlezi khona
n ukumthola kwakho ungamthola ngepelaveke kwaphela
ingqondwakhe seyicabanga ngokubotjhwa n angakenzi n litho
nekampa leyo kaskhosana eneenkomo n n akayazi
ingondade seyicabanga ngokubotjhwa angakenzi litho n
n s okhukhulamungu n um elangeni lamasumi amabili nobunana
ngabelethelwa epumalanga kwandebele n matheyden s loke
n umnyango wezokulima n umazibuse n wesewula afrika
n udade n wakhambela futhi n ekwendeni
awa n midle sengiyijamise njengentethe ecabazini
mhlazana amalanga amahlanu n ku kumrhayile
n yosale wena kutjho umasango ngokurabhela
malanga matjhumi amabili nethoba kuvelabahlinze n
amatjhumi amabili nanye n kukhukhumba kukhuwukhulamungu
mbala iwahle khudlwana n ihliziyo kamavela
lilanga elimatjhumi amabili nanye s kusinyikhaba
lokho kwaziwa nguye kuskhosana n nomasango
zingaki incwadi zakwabona s ezikitjhwa enyakeni
nekoro yezokuthintana nayo ithemvele s uthekiyinoloji
amatjhila wokwenza impahla nawo s ayahluka
imvelaphi yamandebele s ayaziwa kuhle hle
abantwana bebakatelelwa eenkolweni bonyana bafundenlimi lesimu
irhwebo elinelawulo elihle s leemali liyakhula
abantu babasa umlilo s kuye bafuthumale
ubaba uthami bholana s mqozululi wezomnotho
imrabaraba umnandi khulu lokha nani banengi
bese kube nalezo zokuditjha s nokunandisa
irhwebo lezinfhvthi s rhwebo elithuthukayo lef

notes.Substitution note: These are character level substitutions which are used to approximate phoneme confusion.
notes.Morphological analysis note: Morphological errors include stem mismatches and prefix/suffix mismatches.
